feed.title: Akaunting Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Akaunting: 3.1.12
entry.content:
Added

  • Document list page add default tab feature (#3214)
  • Transaction list page add default tab feature (#3215)
  • Multi-dashboard feature styling (#3220)
  • Ability to change document colour and contact based on invoice (#3221)

Changed

  • New Crowdin translations (#3202)
  • Document recurring index blade flexiable columns (#3203)
  • Transaction and Transaction recurring index blade flexiable columns (#3204)
  • Document index bulk action form flexible (#3208)
  • Transaction index bulk action form flexible (#3209)
  • Ability to change document colour and contact based on invoice style fixed (#3222)

Fixed

  • Unable to send email when FIREWALL_ENABLED=true (#3205)
  • Fix deprecation warning in Notification.php by handling null values iâ€¦ (#3207)
  • Notification style issue solved (#3210)
  • RTL issues fixed (#3211)
  • Invoice payments to partially paid invoice (#3212)
  • Fixed report filter period issue (#3216)
  • The issue of displaying long months in the date filter has been resolved (#3217)
  • Reconciliation displays incorrect currency (#3218)

entry.title: New release for Akaunting: 3.1.13
entry.content:
Added

  • Added suggestion header directive (#3226)

Changed

  • New Crowdin translations (#3243)
  • Dashboard slider style (#3227)
  • Modify the Transactions import page template and add a dynamic import page feature (#3244)

Fixed

  • Unable to install the app if your database is SQLite (#3164)
  • Dashboard - Calendar Control (#3230)
  • Datepicker shortcut issue fixed (#3231)
  • Fixed zero amount document status (#3238)
  • Report date range incorrect (#3239)

entry.title: New release for Akaunting: 3.1.14
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed document form (create/edit) page blank page issue (#3246)

entry.title: New release for Akaunting: 3.1.15
entry.content:
Added

  • Added document show new stack (#3251)
  • Added document item quantity mathematical operations (#3258)

Changed

  • New Crowdin translations (#3250)
  • Updated document import export fields (#3256)

Fixed

  • Bugs Found on Discount (#2797)
  • Fixed import route issue (#3247)
  • Global discount calculate method changed (#3248)
  • Dashboard - "This Year" wrong (#3249)
  • Fixed document item search disabled issue (#3253)
  • Fixed date filter financial start date issue (#3255)
  • Fixed document import item tax issue (#3257)

entry.title: New release for Akaunting: 3.1.16
entry.content:
Added

  • Added recurring transaction tax (#3269)
  • Added export document item discount fields (#3272)

Changed

  • Update category component (#3267)
  • Updated Vue file styles. (#3268)

Fixed

  • Fixed report show print issue (#3265)
  • Fixed document line discount calculation issue (#3266)
  • Fixed import date format issue (#3270)
  • Fixed reconcilation list page (#3273)
  • Fixed import currency thousands separator (#3274)
  • Fixed bulk action download (#3275)
  • Fixed report search invalid date filter issue (#3277)
  • Create new currency decimal and thousands field control (#3278)
  • Fixed bulk action page and limit control (#3279)
  • Fixed reconcilation calculate issue fixed (#3280)
